member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowDependencyType
member.summary: This class specifies the integer flags to set the workflowdependency.type property. Although the property may accept any value, these are the valid values.This class does not need instantiation or initialization because the fields represent constant integer values. These values are intended to be used when setting entity property values.The WorkflowDependencyType class exposes the following members.

member.summary: Specifies a dependency on an attribute definition.

member.summary: Specifies a dependency on a custom entity definition.

member.summary: Specifies a dependency on a local parameter.

member.summary: Specifies a dependency on a primary entity image.

member.summary: Specifies a dependency on a primary entity post image.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowDependencyType.PrimaryEntityPreImage
member.summary: Specifies a dependency on a primary entity pre image.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowDependencyType.RelatedEntityImage
member.summary: Specifies a dependency on a related entity image.

member.summary: Specifies a dependency on an SDK association.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowStepActivityStatus
member.summary: This class specifies the integer flags to set the StepActivity.Status property. Although the property may accept any value, these are the valid values.This class does not need instantiation or initialization because the fields represent constant integer values. These values are intended to be used when setting entity property values.The WorkflowStepActivityStatus class exposes the following members.

member.summary: Indicates the step has been cancelled.

member.summary: The step is in progress.

member.summary: The step has successfully completed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xrm.Sdk.Workflow.WorkflowStepActivityStatus.Waiting
member.summary: Indicates the step is waiting.
